mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fr_admin_menu WHERE isdel = 0 AND pid IS NULL AND id IN (SELECT menuid FROM fr_user_menu_relation WHERE userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ORDER BY orderid ASC
